feed.title: Cypress Hills (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 12:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: NW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
